name: The Alluring Chateau of the Loire
description:
DESCRIPTION
This fairytale Château with its collection of outbuildings was built in the early 15th century by Hardouin des Roches (Lord of the Bans), and was thoughtfully extended in the 17th and 18th centuries.
Spaces and capacities
THE CHÂTEAU
The oldest part of the Château was built in the 15th century and comprises of 3 storeys, including:
Ground Floor: Kitchen and Grand Reception
First Floor: 4 Large Bedrooms
Second Floor: 3 Bedroom Apartment
There are a total of 4 bathrooms in this area.
THE ORANGERIE
The accommodation in the Orangerie comprises of 6 ensuite bedrooms, a kitchen, dining room and laundry. In addition, there is an accessible bedroom on the ground floor with 2 queen sized beds (enabling a carer to sleep in the same room) and a specialised wheelchair access shower unit.
Dating from the 19th century, the Orangery of the Château is located in the middle of a 11 hectare park which will offer you an enchanting and authentic setting for the celebration of your big day.
With its 250m2 glass roof with a breathtaking view of the French garden and backing onto a 120m2 Orangery, the capacity is 300 people seated.
Benefits
The Château team will be at your disposal to assist you in your preparations. These professionals will be able to advise you on service providers who will respond to your requests to make your reception unforgettable.
Spaces
Reception room, terrace, garden, marquee, dance floor, parking, kitchen for the caterer, Swimming pool for the weekend at an additional cost. Tennis court
ON SITE
Relax and enjoy the beauty and tranquility of 11 Hectares of private parklands and gardens
Swimming pool with pool pavilion
Pool
Grand piano
Games Room with table tennis
A small selection of bikes
Croquet, boules & cricket equipment
Walking lanes and bike tracks
Chapel
Washing machine & dryer in both the Château and the Orangerie
Satellite TV in the Lounge Room ("Freeview" channels only) and DVD Télévision
Wifi throughout
Function Room facilities if celebrating a special event. Suggestions can be made regarding local chefs and other services
Arrival by helicopter is possible.
We can also organise a helicopter ride to view the estate and gardens of the Chateau from above.
We have excellent relationships with some of the best suppliers in France, including a Michelin starred restaurant, florists, hairdresser (three times awarded "Best Hairdresser in the World"), photographers and planners.
ACCOMMODATION
THE CHÂTEAU
Experience the historic of a 15th century French Château
Sleeps between 15-17
First Floor
Room 1: 1 King Bed Chambre 1: 1 Grand lit (180X200)
Room 2: 1 Queen Bed + 2 Single Beds (with ensuite)
Room 3: 1 Queen Bed + 1 Single Bed
Room 4: 1 Queen Bed
Second Floor
Room 5: 1 Queen Bed
Room 6: 2 Single Beds
This floor, which acts as an apartment, has a bathroom, lounge and dining table. Access is via an ancient stone staircase.
THE ORANGERIE
Experience the refined luxury of this 17th & 18th century extension
Sleeps between 14-16
Room 1: Wheelchair Accessible Room with 2 Queen Beds
Second Floor
Room 2: 1 Queen Bed with Large Ensuite
Room 3, 4, 5 & 7: 1 Queen Bed with Ensuite
Room 6: 2 Single Beds with Ensuite
A three night stay including privatisation of the whole estate is available from 7000 euros. For more information please do get in touch and we will be more than happy to help.
